text: is there a variable available to write the template name being used on a page like {{ template_id }}? The idea is to have a global stylesheet that could change CSS across multiple templates. Example: <body class="lp {{ content_id }} {{ template_id }}">
i don't think that one is documented anywhere
Thank you for your reply. I tried that and it outputs the equivalent of {{ content_id }} so it is data relating to the page content but not the page template being used.
